title: Dobra Tea
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Japanese, Middle Eastern, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Fish and vegetarian. Tea house offering a light food menu with small plates such as pita with hummus, seaweed salad, nuts and seeds, cake and chocolate. Large selection of loose-leaf teas. Note that the takadasan rice contains bonito flakes (fish). Oct 2014 re-open here; previously at 151 Middle St.
